references.paper_title: Mastering the game of Go with deep neural networks and tree search
references.reason: This paper is highly influential as it demonstrates the power of deep reinforcement learning in achieving superhuman performance on a complex game like Go.
This paper introduces a key reinforcement learning algorithm, TRPO, which is crucial for efficiently training complex policies in high-dimensional spaces.

references.paper_title: High-dimensional continuous control using generalized advantage estimation
references.reason: This work introduces generalized advantage estimation (GAE), a crucial technique for improving the efficiency and stability of reinforcement learning algorithms.

references.paper_title: Mastering the game of Go without human knowledge
references.reason: This paper showcases the potential of reinforcement learning to develop agents that surpass human expertise without using human-labeled data.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces chain-of-thought prompting, a method which significantly improves the reasoning abilities of LLMs by prompting them to generate intermediate reasoning steps.
